END DIALOGUES: -----------------------------
#1 - the puzzle has been completed set whatever global is required for the force field to be deactivated
#2 - something was done wrong, pillars must be reset the party is struck with electrical damage set KOR_PILLAR_START to FALSE
#3 - player gives up (or stops) no change
